publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-311 Mr Brian Monteith: Nicola Oldroyd— That the Parliament deplores the overzealous action of Hugh Dallas, the fourth official at the recent Hibernian versus Dundee United game, for reporting Hibernian FC’s 15-year-old ballgirl, Nicola Oldroyd, to match stewards for stating that the "referee needed glasses", regrets Hiberian FC’s overreaction in dismissing Nicola after four years flawless service and calls upon the club to reinstate her and replace the punishment with a modest fine.

S1M-311 Mr Brian Monteith: Nicola Oldroyd—That the Parliament deplores the overzealous action of Hugh Dallas, the fourth official at the recent Hibs versus Dundee United game, for reporting Hibernian FC’s 15-year-old ballgirl, Nicola Oldroyd, to match stewards for stating that the "referee needed glasses", regrets Hiberian FC’s overreaction in dismissing Nicola after four years flawless service and calls upon the club to reinstate her and replace the punishment with a modest fine. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton
S1M-311 Nicola Oldroyd (lodged on 23 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-311 Mr Brian Monteith: Nicola Oldroyd—That the Parliament deplores the overzealous action of Hugh Dallas, the fourth official at the recent Hibs versus Dundee United game, for reporting Hibernian FC’s 15-year-old ballgirl, Nicola Oldroyd, to match stewards for stating that the "referee needed glasses", regrets Hiberian FC’s overreaction in dismissing Nicola after four years flawless service and calls upon the club to reinstate her and replace the punishment with a modest fine. Supported by: Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton

S1M-311 Nicola Oldroyd (lodged on 23 November 1999) Ms Margo MacDonald*

S1M-311 Mr Brian Monteith: Nicola Oldroyd—That the Parliament deplores the overzealous action of Hugh Dallas, the fourth official at the recent Hibs versus Dundee United game, for reporting Hibernian FC’s 15-year-old ballgirl, Nicola Oldroyd, to match stewards for stating that the "referee needed glasses", regrets Hiberian FC’s overreaction in dismissing Nicola after four years flawless service and calls upon the club to reinstate her and replace the punishment with a modest fine. Supported by: Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Ms Margo MacDonald
